briefdescription.para: Parameters that should be in the dictionary: lower_left - Position of lower left corner (array of doubles) upper_right - Position of upper right corner (array of doubles) azimuth_angle - Rotation angle in degrees from x-axis (double), optional polar_angle - Rotation angle in degrees from z-axis (double), the polar angle does not apply in 2D, optional.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Position< D > &lower_left, const Position< D > &upper_right, const double azimuth_angle=0.0, const double polar_angle=0.0)
memberdef.name: BoxMask

simplesect.para: true if point is inside the box
true if the whole given box is inside this box
true if the whole given box is outside this box

briefdescription.para: The whole mask is inside (i.e., false everywhere outside) the bounding box.

simplesect.para: a dictionary with the definition for this mask.
dynamically allocated copy of mask object
the name of this mask type.

briefdescription.para: Calculate the min/max x, y, z values in case of a rotated box.
